articles.title: Racer-turned-adult star Renee Gracie shares Christmas photos; Indians can`t handle it - Zee News
articles.description: Renee Gracie, the sports star-turned-adult film actor has quite a fan follwing in India. She recently posted a few pictures on her Instagram handle for Christmas and her fans went into a tizzy.
